#summary Benchmark results for a 2 Quad-Core Xeon MacOS X 64bit

Comments:

  * Updated several libraries
  * Changed JBlAS symmetric positive definite inverse
  * Changed MTJ Symmetric EVD
  * The newer version of JBlAS significantly slower than the previous version, which is why UJMP runs faster than JBlAS even though it is calling JBLAS.

Test Environment:
|| Date || 2011.07.20 ||
|| OS   || MacOS 10.6.8 64bit  ||
|| CPU  || 2 Quad-Core Intel Xeon - 8 cores (16 hyperthreads) ||
|| RAM || 12GB ||
|| CPU Cache || 8MB L3, 256kB L2, 32kB ||
|| JVM  || Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server 1.6.0_26 ||
|| Benchmark || 0.8 ||

Tested Libraries:
|| Name || Version         || ||
|| Colt ||  1.2            || ||
|| Commons Math || 2.1     || ||
|| EJML ||  0.16           || ||
|| Jama || 1.0.2           || ||

|| MTJ || 0.9.13           || ||
